Html:
Hi radioman - fantastic project - thanks and well done.

I am writing an inhouse database system using vb.net 2008; winforms; MySQL database.  It works brilliantly, however if I or my colleagues zoom into the map or out of the map quickly, the whole application freezes.  It doesn't throw an exception that I can find.  It isn't specific to any particular machine - all machines are Windows 7 but that is all that is common- mine is 64bit - the others are not.

 

Any assistance or advice would be greatly appreciated.
i've tried that as fast as my fingers can, nothing ;} maybe you use old version or debug build?
thanks for the reply.  I will check my version and test again.

Radioman, that seems to work - certainly on my development machine. I've now got my colleagues testing  it on their various machines.

Thanks again for the incredible work.
